title: Why are sweet potatoes white inside? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sweet potatoes move closer in numerous distinct colors. The skin can be white, yellow, red, purple or brown, and the meat can be white, yellow, orange or purple. In whatever way in the United States, there are two main kind of sweet potato. One has a golden skin with creamy white flesh and a breakable feel. Sweet potatoes are extremely adaptable as fragment of a paleo diet. Not only are they acceptable as a pleasant option with your lunch or dinner, but they are also a considerable ingredient when baking naturally sweet Paleo regards.
